interactions.Alarm:
The user, a 45-54 year old single working professional from the United States, frequently interacts with the assistant to manage her weekday morning alarms. She prefers to wake up at 6:30 AM to a gentle nature sound, allowing her ample time to get ready for work.

On occasions when she needs to wake up earlier or later than her usual 6:30 AM time, the user requests temporary one-time alarms, often specifying the desired wake-up time the night before. She has also asked the assistant to set weekend alarms for specific events or appointments, though these are less frequent.

The user values the assistant's reliability in setting and managing her alarms accurately. Over time, the user has explored additional features, such as setting multiple alarms with different sounds for varied purposes (e.g., a separate alarm for exercise reminders).
